main event: A civilian reported a sighting of an unidentified object in Palmyra, Michigan on 15 December 1968.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes,The object was described as having a light in the south, larger and more intense than stars,The object changed in color and intensity over time,There was no physical evidence found despite the detailed observations,The final conclusion stated it was a balloon (not air).
sighted object: an unidentified object appearing as a light
witness description: Delmira Marie Harrington, a 27-year-old male, was in the army and had experience working with topography.
